arts.ttl: Napoli Boss Heaps Praise on Summer Signing After Palermo Rout
arts.sum: Napoli manager Antonio Conte has praised Scottish midfielder Billy Gilmour following a dominant 5-0 Coppa Italia win against Palermo. After a nerve-shredding win against Modena in the opening round, the Partenopei picked another Serie B outfit apart to progress into the next stage. The post Napoli Boss Heaps Praise on Summer Signing After Palermo Rout appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Scott McTominay kisses the badge after scoring his first goal for Napoli following an assist from former Man United team-mate Romelu Lukaku
arts.sum: The ex-United duo had been on the field for less than 60 seconds before they combined for the fifth and final goal of Thursday's one-sided game in the Coppa Italia.

arts.ttl: Transfer Talk: Juventus could consider going for Osimhen
arts.sum: Juventus are reportedly looking to bring in striker Victor Osimhen following his loan at Galatasaray from Napoli. Transfer Talk has the latest.

arts.ttl: Benfica Head Motivates David Neres Sale to Napoli
arts.sum: Former Milan and Fiorentina legend and current Benfica president Rui Costa has revisited the sale of Davide Neres to Napoli. The Partenopei paid €28M for the speedster, who cracked Serie A’s record books thanks to three consecutive assists.
